name: OODA SEO
tagline: Our Expertise. Your Brand. Delivered Online.
description:
OODA SEO is a Search Engine Optimization and Internet Marketing consultancy firm with offices in Montreal and Ottawa, Canada.
We use proven and professional search engine marketing and social media marketing techniques to launch your business to the next level. Our focus is to help you gain critical competitor insight, outline an online marketing strategy and improve your rankings, while providing a continuous feedback loop to keep you ahead of the game.
